text: وَلَا يَحۡزُنكَ قَوۡلُهُمۡۘ إِنَّ ٱلۡعِزَّةَ لِلَّهِ جَمِيعًاۚ هُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ

translation.en: And let not their speech grieve you. Indeed, honor [due to power] belongs to Allah entirely. He is the Hearing, the Knowing
translation.id: Dan janganlah engkau (Muhammad) sedih oleh perkataan mereka. Sungguh, kekuasaan itu seluruhnya milik Allah. Dia Maha Mendengar, Maha Mengetahui
